name: 999,999 Tanks
description:
A simple RTS where you must destroy your enemies!

This game was made as a warmup game for Ludum Dare 37 in an attempt to teach myself the inner workings of an Entity–component–system called Tiny-ECS.

This game also includes a fancy Makefile, bump.lua and Tiled integration! Whee!

Some information about the assets:

  • Sci-fi RTS sprites are from the amazing KenneyNL.
  • The song Saturn by Marsel Minga is used in the game, and is Public Domain (CC0)
